eventDecorators.name: PriceFeeding
eventDecorators.description: Signals that a new price update request is being posted to the Witnet Request Board.

functionDecorators.name: bytecode
functionDecorators.description: Contains a well-formed Witnet Data Request, encoded using Protocol Buffers.

functionDecorators.name: estimateUpdateFee
functionDecorators.description: Estimates minimum fee amount in native currency to be paid when requesting a new price update. Actual fee depends on the gas price of the `requestUpdate()` transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: _gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: Gas price expected to be paid when calling `requestUpdate()`.

functionDecorators.name: hash
functionDecorators.description: Returns SHA256 hash of Witnet Data Request as CBOR-encoded bytes.

functionDecorators.name: lastPrice
functionDecorators.description: Returns result of the last valid price update request successfully solved by the Witnet oracle.

functionDecorators.name: lastTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the EVM-timestamp when last valid price was reported back from the Witnet oracle.

functionDecorators.name: lastValue
functionDecorators.description: Returns tuple containing last valid price and timestamp, as well as status code of latest update request that got posted to the Witnet Request Board.

returnDecorators.name: _lastPrice
returnDecorators.description: Last valid price reported back from the Witnet oracle.

returnDecorators.name: _lastTimestamp
returnDecorators.description: EVM-timestamp of the last valid price.

returnDecorators.name: _lastDrTxHash
returnDecorators.description: Hash of the Witnet Data Request that solved the last valid price.

returnDecorators.name: _latestUpdateStatus
returnDecorators.description: Status code of the latest update request.

functionDecorators.name: latestQueryId
functionDecorators.description: Stores the ID of the last price update posted to the Witnet Request Board.

functionDecorators.name: latestUpdateDrTxHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns identifier of the latest update request posted to the Witnet Request Board. Returning 0 while the latest update request remains unsolved.

functionDecorators.name: latestUpdateErrorMessage
functionDecorators.description: Returns error message of latest update request posted to the Witnet Request Board. Returning empty string if the latest update request remains unsolved, orif it was succesfully solved with no errors.

functionDecorators.name: latestUpdateStatus
functionDecorators.description: Returns status code of latest update request posted to the Witnet Request Board:. Status codes:- 200: update request was succesfully solved with no errors- 400: update request was solved with errors- 404: update request was not solved yet.

functionDecorators.name: pendingUpdate
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if latest update request posted to the Witnet Request Board has not been solved yet by the Witnet oracle.

functionDecorators.name: requestUpdate
functionDecorators.description: Posts a new price update request to the Witnet Request Board. Requires payment of a fee that depends on the value of `tx.gasprice`. See `estimateUpdateFee(uint256)`. If previous update request was not solved yet, calling this method again allowsupgrading the update fee if called with a higher `tx.gasprice` value.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Tells whether this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section]to learn more about how these ids are created.
